# References {#sec-references .unnumbered}


::: {.cell}

:::


## Data sources {#sec-data-sources}

::: {#data-source-refs .references .hanging-indent}

* Bertelsmann Stiftung (2018) *Sustainable Governance Indicators 2018*, Gütersloh, Germany: Bertelsmann Stiftung, [http://www.sgi-network.org](url)
* Dahlström C, Teorell J, Dahlberg S, Hartmann F, Lindberg A and Nistotskaya M (2015) *The QoG Expert Survey Dataset II*, Gothenburg: The Quality of Government Institute, University of Gothenburg, [https://qog.pol.gu.se/ data/datadownloads/qogexpertsurveydata](url)
* DIGIWHIST (2018) *Opentender*, Hungary: Government Transparency Institute, [https://opentender.eu](url)
* European Commission (2018) *eGovernment Benchmark Report 2018*, Brussels: European Commission, [https://ec.europa.eu/digital-single-market/en/news/ egovernment-benchmark-2018-digital-efforts-european- countries-are-visibly-paying](url)
* ILO (2018) *ILO Statistics*, Geneva: International Labour Organization, [https://www.ilo.org/ilostat/](url)
* International Budget Partnership (2018) *Open Budget Survey 2017*, Washington DC: International Budget Partnership, [http://survey.internationalbudget.org](url)
* OECD (2013) *Government at a Glance 2013*, Paris: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, [https://doi.org/10.1787/gov_glance-2013-en](url)
* OECD (2015) *Government at a Glance 2015*, Paris: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, [https://doi.org/10.1787/gov_glance-2015-en](url)
* OECD (2016) *Dataset on Public Procurement*, Paris: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, [https://qdd.oecd.org/subject. aspx?Subject=GOV_PUBPRO_2016](url)
* OECD (2016) *Dataset on the Governance of Critical Risks*, Paris: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, [https://qdd.oecd.org/subject. aspx?Subject=GOV_RISK](url)
* OECD (2017) *Government at a Glance 2017*, Paris: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, [https://doi.org/10.1787/gov_glance-2017-en](url)
* OECD (2017) *Tax Administration Comparative Information Series*, Paris: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, [https://qdd.oecd.org/ subject.aspx?Subject=TAS](url)
* OECD (2018) *Composite Indicators of Regulatory Policy and Governance*, Paris: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, [https://stats.oecd.org/ Index.aspx?QueryId=85336](url)
* OECD (2018) *Survey of Adult Skills (Programme for International Assessment of Adult Competencies)*, Paris: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, [http://www.oecd.org/skills/piaac/](url)
* Open Knowledge International (2017) *Global Open Data Index*, London: Open Knowledge Foundation, [https://index.okfn.org/](url)
* Transparency International (2017) *Global Corruption Barometer*, Berlin: Transparency International, [http://gcb.transparency.org/](url)
* UNDESA (2018) *United Nations E-Government Survey 2018*, New York: United Nations, [https://publicadministration.un.org/egovkb/en-us/Reports/UN-E-Government-Survey-2018](url)
* UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2018) *Population by minimum completed level of education (cumulative)*, Montreal: UNESCO Institute for Statistics, [http://data.uis.unesco.org/index.aspx?queryid=168](url)
* UNIDRR (2016) *Hyogo Framework for Action National Progress Query Tool*, New York: United Nations, [https://www.preventionweb.net/applications/hfa/qbnhfa/](url)
* World Bank (2017) *FMIS And Open Budget Data Global Dataset*, Washington DC: The World Bank, [https://datacatalog.worldbank.org/dataset/fmis-and-open-budget-data-global-dataset](url)
* World Bank (2018) *Worldwide Development Indicators*, Washington DC: The World Bank, [https://data.worldbank.org/indicator/](url)
* World Economic Forum (2017) *Global Competitiveness Index 2017-18 (Executive Opinion Survey)*, Geneva: World Economic Forum, [http://reports.weforum.org/global-competitiveness-index-2017-2018/downloads/](url)
* World Justice Project (2018) *Rule of Law Index 2017-18*, Washington DC: World Justice Project, [https://worldjusticeproject.org/our-work/wjp-rule-law-index/wjp-rule-law-index-2017%E2%80%932018](url)
* World Wide Web Foundation (2017) *Open Data Barometer: 4th Edition*, Washington DC: World Wide Web Foundation, [https://opendatabarometer.org/4thedition/](url)

:::

## Software packages {#sec-software}

::: {#data-source-refs .references .hanging-indent}

* Arel-Bundock V., Enevoldsen N. and Yetman C. J. (2018) *countrycode: An R package to convert country names and country codes*, Journal of Open Source Software 3(28): 848, [https://doi.org/10.21105/joss.00848](url)
* Bache Stefan Milton and Wickham Hadley (2014) *magrittr: A Forward-Pipe Operator for R*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=magrittr](url)
* Bescond D. (2021) *Rilostat: ILO Open Data via Ilostat Bulk Download Facility or SDMX Web Service*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=Rilostat](url)
* Caro D. H. and Biecek P. (2017) *intsvy: An R Package for Analyzing International Large-Scale Assessment Data*, Journal of Statistical Software 81(7), [https://doi.org/10.18637/jss.v081.i07](url)
* Firke S. (2018) *janitor: Simple Tools for Examining and Cleaning Dirty Data*, [NA](url)
* Müller K. and Wickham H. (2017) *tibble: Simple Data Frames*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tibble](url)
* R Core Team (2016) *R: A Language and Environment for Statistical Computing*, Vienna, Austria: R Foundation for Statistical Computing, [https://www.R-project.org/](url)
* van Buuren S. and Groothuis-Oudshoorn K. (2011) *mice: Multivariate Imputation by Chained Equations in R*, Journal of Statistical Software 45(3): 1--67, [https://doi.org/10.18637/jss.v045.i03](url)
* Wickham H. (2016) *ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis*, New York: Springer-Verlag New York, [https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org](url)
* Wickham H. (2016) *rvest: Easily Harvest (Scrape) Web Pages*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rvest](url)
* Wickham H. (2017) *stringr: Simple, Consistent Wrappers for Common String Operations*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=stringr](url)
* Wickham H. and Bryan J. (2017) *readxl: Read Excel Files*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=readxl](url)
* Wickham H. and Henry L. (2017) *purrr: Functional Programming Tools*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=purrr](url)
* Wickham H. and Henry L. (2017) *tidyr: Easily Tidy Data with 'spread()' and 'gather()' Functions*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tidyr](url)
* Wickham H. and Miller E. (2017) *haven: Import and Export 'SPSS', 'Stata' and 'SAS' Files*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=haven](url)
* Wickham H. and Seidel D. (2017) *scales: Scale Functions for Visualization*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=scales](url)
* Wickham H., François R., Henry L. and Müller K. (2017) *dplyr: A Grammar of Data Manipulation*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=dplyr](url)
* Wickham H., Hester J. and Bryan J. (2017) *readr: Read Rectangular Text Data*, [https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=readr](url)

:::
